bug.author: n-gao
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/linalg/diag_part?version=nightly>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/linalg/diag_part?version=nightly</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The diag_part documentation contains old examples of non-existing APIs, it uses tf.matrix_diag_part in the examples which does not exist.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/n-gao>@n-gao</denchmark-link> Thanks for reporting the issue. Agree. It is defined correctly in the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/linalg/diag_part?version=nightly>tf-nightly</denchmark-link> but in the examples should have been replaced by . Thanks! Are you interested in creating PR to update the docs. Thanks!
